project.name: training-sample-content Magnolia Module
project.description: This module of the templating project represents a specific implementation, here a module containing sample content as the STK's'demo-project' module is. Therefore it would contain all sample content needed for proper development. Usually such a module is not deployed on live system. Dropping the jar of this module will install and provide the complete sample content placed into this module. In the exercises of the training, this module will be the base for creating the first Magnolia module. There for it only contains a pom.xml, but no inner Magnolia structure yet.
